newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Guangdong Inv sells HK$32 mln office unit.
newsitem.headline: Guangdong Inv sells HK$32 mln office unit.

text.p: Guangdong Investment Ltd said on Thursday it will sell an office unit in its building on Connaught Road Central in Hong Kong's Sheung Wan district to its 39.25 percent controlling parent Guangdong Enterprises (Holdings) Ltd for HK$31.60 million.

The office unit covers a gross floor area of 3,901 square feet and is on the 20th floor of Guangdong Investment Tower. The Tower is a 27-storey office building completed in early 1996 located south of the Macau Ferry Terminal, the comapny said.
The deal is expected to complete on December 31, 1996.

Guangdong Investment, which indirectly owns the entire office building, said it has also agreed to lease another office unit in the Tower to the parent at a monthly rental of HK$87,906 for a term of two years commencing on January 2, 1997.
